job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongDESCRIPTIONstrongppChat channels and social media are the trusted way to communicate on personal and corporate devices Regulation makes compliance and security on personal devices challengingppDeepViews security platform is operational across Instagram WhatsApp The vision is to be the single platform for all chat channels and selected social channels From archiving chats to early detection data leaksppDeepView is an early stage startup with significant customer traction Our paying clients include FTSE Banks and regulators Our solution is one of the first GDPR compliant SaaS recording solutions already built patented in the US Additionally our PatentPending ML is one of the leading technologies able to read photos and videos for data leaksppWe have a burning ambition to be the leaders in security for safe chat use allowing teams to safely meet sales targets with their current chat platforms Our revenuegenerating platform has evolved from a compliance solution to a data security and archiving solution giving us the benefit of understanding the full landscapeppWe are looking for an experienced computer vision Data Scientist to join our team in a leadership position working alongside our founder and CEO Catherine Kitty Parry You would report into Alex Sabadyr CTO at DeepView as well as DeepViews CEO Catherine a serial entrepreneur and Young Global Leader of World Economic Forum Davos She leads an entrepreneurial team from diverse background with experience in communications and PR investment banking deep tech data science and MLAI hedge funds and private equity and is looking for a copilot to manage and build out the existing groupppWhilst still small this fastgrowing team will allow you to make your mark You are a selfstarter with a proven ability in machine vision experience and passion for building marketleading products You will be responsible for the research work in regards to adopting the topnotch approaches in computer vision and AI planning and building models gathering training datasets ongoing improvementsppBy joining DeepView youll bring your experience alongside Alex and help to grow a culture of results and flexibility Along with exceptional client care and communication whilst continuing to lead the tech team with a detailed mindsetppstrongROLE AND RESPONSIBILITYstrongpulliLead the computer vision departmentliliPlan and build a state of art AIliliOwn the full cycle of building and releasing image recognition modelsliulpstrongDESIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCEstrongpulliGreat theoretical knowledge in AI and computer vision algorithmsliliPractical experience with at least one of the following algorithms Faster RCNN SSD YOLOliliWide practical experience in building models from ground up using different approaches and frameworksliliGood analytical skillsliliBasic knowledge of programming languages required to use extend and adopt AI frameworks PythonJavaGoliulpstrongPERSONAL ATTRIBUTESstrongpulliStrong team worker is essential with an ability to empathise and work with nonsoftware peopleliliGood communicatorliulpstrongCOMPENSATIONstrongpulliFull TimePartTimeliliBasic salary dependent on experience and locationliul
